desc: Return the authentication result after doing a 3D Secure authentication only.

merchantAccount.desc: The merchant account identifier, with which the authentication was processed.

pspReference.desc: The pspReference identifier for the transaction.

threeDS1Result.desc: The result of the 3D Secure authentication.

threeDAuthenticatedResponse.desc: The authentication response from the ACS.

threeDOfferedResponse.desc: Whether 3D Secure was offered or not.

xid.desc: A unique transaction identifier generated by the MPI on behalf of the merchant to identify the 3D Secure transaction, in Base64 encoding.

threeDS2Result.desc: The result of the 3D Secure 2 authentication.

authenticationValue.desc: The authenticationValue value as defined in the 3D Secure 2 specification.

cavvAlgorithm.desc: The algorithm used by the ACS to calculate the authentication value, only for CartesBancaires integrations.

dsTransID.desc: The dsTransID value as defined in the 3D Secure 2 specification.

eci.desc: The eci value as defined in the 3D Secure 2 specification.

messageVersion.desc: The messageVersion value as defined in the 3D Secure 2 specification.

threeDSServerTransID.desc: The threeDSServerTransID value as defined in the 3D Secure 2 specification.

timestamp.desc: The timestamp value of the 3D Secure 2 authentication.

transStatus.desc: The transStatus value as defined in the 3D Secure 2 specification.

transStatusReason.desc: The transStatusReason value as defined in the 3D Secure 2 specification.

whiteListStatus.desc: The whiteListStatus value as defined in the 3D Secure 2 specification.
